description: After applying monthly cumulative updates, Java applications running on Tomcat may experience failures or malfunction. Specifically, the issue arises when the JRE_HOME system variable becomes misconfigured, necessitating a reset of this variable to its correct value to restore functionality. This peculiar scenario raises concerns regarding the impact of cumulative updates on Java application environments, especially as it appears to be an undocumented flaw affecting operation without clear guidance from Microsoft.
